msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch

msg: Fix Apache::TestRequest::lwp_as_string to work with LWP 5.79

author: jorton
msg: ap_replace_stderr_log): Use APR_LARGEFILE when opening log files, to
allow log files to exceed the 2Gb limit if necessary.

msg: make sure that die() messages from Test::Harness::_show_results() make it
back to the user, particularly the summary printed when some tests fail
